typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		Postinumero as string,
		Alue as string,
		Kaupunki as string,
		Talotyyppi as string,
		Rakennusvuosi as string,
		Neliohinta_2010 as decimal(20,2),
		Kauppojen_lukumaara_2010 as integer,
		Neliohinta_2011 as decimal(20,2),
		Kauppojen_lukumaara_2011 as integer,
		Neliohinta_2012 as decimal(20,2),
		Kauppojen_lukumaara_2012 as integer,
		Neliohinta_2013 as decimal(20,2),
		Kauppojen_lukumaara_2013 as integer,
		Neliohinta_2014 as decimal(20,2),
		Kauppojen_lukumaara_2014 as integer,
		Neliohinta_2015 as decimal(20,2),
		Kauppojen_lukumaara_2015 as integer,
		Neliohinta_2016 as decimal(20,2),
		Kauppojen_lukumaara_2016 as integer,
		Neliohinta_2017 as decimal(20,2),
		Kauppojen_lukumaara_2017 as integer,
		Neliohinta_2018 as decimal(20,2),
		Kauppojen_lukumaara_2018 as integer,
		Paivitetty_pvm as timestamp
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> OsakeasuntojenHinnat20102018
OsakeasuntojenHinnat20102018 unpivot(output(
		Vuosi as integer,
		Neliohinta_2010 as decimal(20,2),
		Neliohinta_2011 as decimal(20,2),
		Neliohinta_2012 as decimal(20,2),
		Neliohinta_2013 as decimal(20,2),
		Neliohinta_2014 as decimal(20,2),
		Neliohinta_2015 as decimal(20,2),
		Neliohinta_2016 as decimal(20,2),
		Neliohinta_2017 as decimal(20,2),
		Neliohinta_2018 as decimal(20,2),
		Kauppojen_lukumaara_2010 as integer,
		Kauppojen_lukumaara_2011 as integer,
		Kauppojen_lukumaara_2012 as integer,
		Kauppojen_lukumaara_2013 as integer,
		Kauppojen_lukumaara_2014 as integer,
		Kauppojen_lukumaara_2015 as integer,
		Kauppojen_lukumaara_2016 as integer,
		Kauppojen_lukumaara_2017 as integer,
		Kauppojen_lukumaara_2018 as integer
	),
	ungroupBy(Postinumero,
		Alue,
		Kaupunki,
		Talotyyppi,
		Rakennusvuosi),
	pivotValues: [2010, 2011, 2012, 2013, 2014, 2015, 2016, 2017, 2018],
	lateral: true,
	ignoreNullPivots: false) ~> Unpivot
